document.full_text: a man dressed as batman was arrested on wednesday after police in a small michigan town found him hanging off the side of a building and carrying concealed weapons including a baton and a can of chemical irritant spray.
document.title: police nab armed "batman" in small michigan town
lines_and_colors: a man dressed as batman was arrested on wednesday after police in a small michigan town found him hanging off the side of a building and carrying concealed weapons including a baton and a can of chemical irritant spray.
